letters.description: Identify the client's presenting issue and its potential origins within the family system.
Clarify the client's position and role within the family system dynamics related to the issue.
Develop an awareness of the hidden dynamics, entanglements, and loyalties operating within the family system.
Explore potential transgenerational trauma patterns affecting the client and the system.
Facilitate empathetic connection and resolution strategies to address systemic imbalances.
Integrate insights and new perspectives to foster healing and empowerment for the client and the system.
